title: Manhunt underway after rural shooting near Perth | 7NEWS
description: Western Australia Police are searching for 58-year-old Kenneth Giles, who allegedly shot a woman during a domestic violence incident on a rural property near Malua, north of Perth. The woman was hospitalised with non-life-threatening injuries. Giles is believed to have fled the scene in a Nissan Patrol ute and is described as 173 centimetres tall with a medium build, brown hair and brown eyes. title: US seizes two oil tankers linked to Venezuela | 7NEWS
description: The United States has seized two oil tankers in separate operations near Iceland and the Caribbean, with both vessels allegedly linked to Venezuela and accused of sanctions violations. The coordinated seizures involved multiple US agencies including Homeland Security, with one Russian-flagged tanker tracked for weeks after attempting to evade authorities by changing its name and registration. Moscow has condemned the action as a violation of maritime law, while President Trump has used the incident to criticise NATO amid ongoing tensions over Greenland. title: US seizes Venezuelan oil tankers; WA manhunt underway | 7NEWS
description: US forces have seized two Russian-flagged oil tankers near Iceland and in the Caribbean, both allegedly linked to Venezuela and accused of violating international sanctions. The coordinated operations involved multiple US agencies tracking vessels that had changed names and flags to evade law enforcement. Meanwhile, Western Australian police are hunting 58-year-old Kenneth Giles after he allegedly shot a woman during a domestic violence incident on a rural property north of Perth. title: Knife-wielding intruder terrorises Windsor Gardens family | 7NEWS
description: A knife-wielding intruder broke into a family home in Windsor Gardens, Adelaide, at approximately 3am on Tuesday morning, threatening the parents during the invasion. The offender stole the family's car before abandoning it in Salisbury North. Police are actively searching for the suspect. title: Final Bondi terror attack victim farewelled | 7NEWS
description: Peter Mar, a retired detective and devoted family man, was honoured at a funeral service at St Mary's Cathedral in Sydney. He was remembered as a pillar of the Randwick Rugby Club and described as an incredibly moral and honest man who believed in justice. Hundreds of mourners, including the Prime Minister, opposition leader, and New South Wales Premier, attended the service for the last victim of the Bondi terror attack to be farewelled. title: Woman shot dead by ICE during raid
description: A woman has been killed by ICE agents in Minneapolis. It's alleged she tried to run over law enforcement officers, prompting the officers to draw their weapons. #ice #minneapolis #usa #unitedstates #minnesota

title: US seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker
description: The United States has seized a Russian-flagged oil tanker in the North Atlantic following a dramatic, weekslong chase on the high seas. The operation to seize the sanctioned vessel, which changed its name from the Bella 1 to the Marinera after fleeing the American blockade of Venezuela last month, was carried out early on Wednesday. #usa #oil #oiltanker #russia #venezuela

title: Australians stranded in Yemen as security fears trigger flight shut downs
description: Aussies are among hundreds of tourists stranded in Yemen as conflict between the Yemeni government and Iran-backed Houthi rebels escalates, causing flight cancellations across the country. #yemen #tourist #flights #flightcancellation #iran

title: US seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker | 7NEWS
description: U.S. Coast Guard forces have seized the Bella One, a Russian-flagged oil tanker linked to Venezuela's sanctioned ghost fleet of approximately 1,000 vessels trafficking illegal oil globally. The tanker, which had changed flags multiple times and was reportedly shadowed by Russian submarines, is now under U.S. control with its crew facing prosecution for sanctions violations. President Trump has stated that oil confiscated from previous tanker seizures, totalling several million gallons of crude, will benefit both American and Venezuelan people as part of efforts to establish conditions for a free market economy in Venezuela. title: Two men charged over car thefts targeting elderly in NSW
description: Two men have been charged in relation to a string of car thefts across NSW targeting the elderly. #crime #nsw #nswpolice

title: UK provides support as US seize Russian shadow fleet tanker | 7NEWS
description: The US Coast Guard, in a joint operation with UK forces, has seized the Marinara (formerly Bella One), a Russian-flagged oil tanker part of an estimated 500-vessel shadow fleet transporting sanctioned oil for Iran and Russia. The vessel repeatedly changed its name and flag registration to evade interdiction, sailing under Ghanaian and Russian flags whilst operating in international waters. title: February rate rise less likely as headline inflation dips in latest figures
description: The chance of a February interest rate hike has eased after new figures showed headline inflation falling to 3.4 per cent in November last year. #inflation #interestrates #economics #costofliving #auspol

title: US seizes Russian oil tanker from Venezuela's ghost fleet | 7NEWS
description: Republican strategist Matthew Bartlett says "This is an assertion of U.S. leadership" as the U.S. Coast Guard seizes the Bella One, a Russian-flagged oil tanker operating as part of Venezuela's sanctioned ghost fleet of approximately 500-1,000 vessels trafficking illegal oil globally. The vessel had repeatedly changed its name and flag registration to evade detection whilst transporting sanctioned oil for Iran and Russia. President Trump has stated that confiscated oil totalling several million gallons will benefit American and Venezuelan people as part of efforts to establish a free market economy in Venezuela, whilst also serving as leverage against Vladimir Putin in ongoing negotiations. title: Fatal shooting during ICE operation in Minneapolis| 7NEWS
description: A fatal shooting occurred in Minneapolis during an Immigration and Customs Enforcement operation when a civilian driver was shot by an ICE agent after allegedly using her vehicle to obstruct officers and strike an agent. Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem held a press conference defending the shooting as lawful defensive action, stating the officer followed training protocols when faced with what she characterised as a deadly weapon threat.
